forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Sound Search Overhaul!

comments.text: Hi! Version 153.2 (you're on [version]) overhauls how the sound search works!
You can now search for multiple words, and the words typed can be in any order and still match.
For instance, "When touched then play voice female" would also find "female voice", "female robot voice 2" and so on.
Feedback welcome & hope it's useful! Thx all!

thread.latestCommentText: Feedback welcome & hope it's useful! Thx all!
